Name: Volt Globe
LongDescription: Prevents Ground-type moves from damaging Electric-type Pokémon. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Electric-type Pokémon.  You can get a Volt Globe at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Yellow Silk, a Thunder Dust, and a  Thunder Gem. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
